title: The 10 best Presidents' Day sales to shop right now
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: President's Day deals on TVs, appliances, mattresses, and more
article: The 2021 Presidents' Day sales event is officially underway with fantastic deals from all your favorite retailers like Best Buy, Home Depot, Lowe's, Walmart, and more. We've combed through all the sites to bring you the 10 best Presidents' Day sales we've spotted so far. Presidents' Day deals typically focus on home items such as mattresses, which is why we've included sales from popular sites like Purple, Nectar, and Sealy. Appliances are also a popular sales category, and retailers like Home Depot and Lowe's are offering some of their lowest prices yet on major appliances like refrigerators, washers and dryers, dishwashers, and more. If you're looking for Presidents' Day tech bargains, you can find fantastic deals on TVs, smartwatches, and tablets from Best Buy and Walmart and sitewide savings from popular brands like Dell and HP. See our full list of the best Presidents' Day sales below and keep in mind, most of these deals end on Monday, so you should take advantage of these incredible bargains now before its' too late.

You can also see more offers with our roundup of the best Home Depot Presidents' Day sale and the best Walmart Presidents' Day sale. You can also shop for more bargains in our guide to the best Presidents' Day TV sales and the best Presidents' Day mattress sales.
